author: jsmith
subject: RF cavity maintenance
details: Replaced the coupler on RF cavity 2. All connections verified and vacuum checked to 1e-9 Torr.

author: mwilliams
subject: Beam loss event at sector 5
details: Observed significant beam loss at sector 5 around 09:00. Investigation showed vacuum spike due to leaking bellows. Bellows replaced and beam restored at 11:30.

author: alee
subject: Undulator temperature anomaly
details: U4.2 showing temperature increase of 0.5C above normal. Cooling water flow checked and found nominal. Monitoring for next shift.

author: bjohnson
subject: Storage ring current stable
details: Ring current holding at 500mA with lifetime of 8 hours. Normal operations continuing.

author: ckennedy
subject: Photon shutter interlock test
details: Completed annual interlock test for BL 5.0.2. All shutters responded within spec (<100ms). Safety system verified.

author: dpark
subject: Injection efficiency improvement
details: Adjusted septum timing by 10ns which improved injection efficiency from 85% to 92%. New settings saved to reference.

author: jsmith
subject: Shift summary
details: Quiet afternoon shift. No major issues. 500mA maintained. One brief vacuum event at sector 5 resolved. Handed off to night shift at 18:00.

author: fgarcia
subject: BPM calibration sector 1-4
details: Performed BPM calibration for sectors 1-4. All BPMs within tolerance except BPM-3-2 which shows 50um offset. Scheduled for hardware check.

author: ghuang
subject: Power supply fault PS-7A
details: Power supply PS-7A tripped at 21:15. Fault code indicates over-temperature. Reset attempted but fault persists. Swap with spare unit scheduled for morning.

author: hkim
subject: Night shift handoff
details: Beam dumped at 22:30 for PS-7A issue. Stable at 450mA on backup supply. Monitor PS temperature through night. Day shift to complete swap.

author: ijones
subject: Cryogenic system status
details: LN2 level at 85%. LHe compressor showing nominal pressures. Cold head maintenance due next week.

author: ksmith
subject: RF trip investigation
details: RF cavity 3 tripped at 02:00. Arc detector triggered. Inspection shows no visible damage. Reconditioned cavity and restored to full power by 04:00.
